item.title: Aetheria
item.description: A mythical pure virtual world with no hosting bodies

item.title: Classification of Humans
item.description:
Humans created or influenced by artificial processes.

Humans genetically identical to an existing individual, derived from a single source genome.

Reproductive Clones – Full biological replicas of the original.
Medical Clones – Created for medical purposes, such as organ or tissue harvesting.
Accelerated Clones – Engineered to mature faster than natural humans.
Memory Clones – Clones with implanted memories or consciousness of another individual.

Humans with modified DNA to enhance or alter traits.

Optimized Humans – Modified to eliminate genetic disorders or enhance traits like intelligence or physical strength.
Hybrids – Genetic combinations of human and non-human DNA. (E.g. Angels)

Cyborgs (cybernetic organisms) are categorized based on the extent of their integration with technology, purpose, and the nature of their enhancements.

Autonomous Cyborgs – Fully independent, with cybernetics acting as an extension of their biology.
Remote Cyborgs – Operate under external commands or through remote human oversight.
Hybrid-Control Cyborgs – Blend independent function with remote control capabilities.
Related Article: Telepresence


Natural: A person who was born through natural means rather than artificial replication.
Organic: Referring to their natural, non-engineered conception.
Neo-Humans – A catch-all term for humans with mixed natural and artificial traits, blending organic, engineered, and synthetic origins.
Derived: An term for a person born from existing genetic material, like in cloning or selective reproduction.
Original: A person who is the source of a clone.
Baseline – Implying they represent the genotype from which clones were derived.
Enhanced: A person who have been improved or upgraded after birth.
Singleton: A person (usually Derived) who is unique.
Anomaly: Depending on the context, this could imply rarity or deviation from the norm.

item.title: Fleet Nations
item.description: Fleet Nations, once military forces which belonged to Martian Headquarters and major nations from Earth, declared their independence after the Final War with a peace treaty among each other.

item.title: Heliomancy
item.description:
Heliomancy (or Magic) is a loose term to describe the psychic ability to convert sun energy to a force that manipulate the environment
The Sun is the fuel source of all magic
The measurement for magic power concentrations is LUX
There are many variations of magic, however just like any skill, usually people focuses in one or a few specialized fields
heliomancy is the purest magic form and the base of all magic practices. it is fundamental yet the most prestigious
solar wind shield: the magnetosphere

item.title: Mars
item.description:
Proto-Mars is the birth place of the Solar System's first civilization of humans who practiced Sun-powered magic called Heliomancy.


Immigration to Mars started before the Final War due to Earth's heavy pollutions and war and it was a privilege for the rich.

The government of Martian Colonizers from the Earth civilization

Massive resources was wasted on the Terraform Mars project, leading to the Headquarters' final decision to abandon the project and started a project to recolonize Earth's last habitable continent, Antarctica. [1]

Martians were the richest and most powerful people on Earth, and their genetically engineered human clone workers.



Project Terra Nova↩︎

item.title: Neo-Atlantis
item.description:
Futuristic metropolitan from the past, built for eternity.
People of Neo Atlantis (Netizens) are asleep in the hub (to preserve eternal youth), and roams the city with their robotic avatars.


The city center and the Matrix of Neo-Atlantis.

Where the host bodies sleeps.

The supercomputer that runs Neo Atlantis.

Provides robotic avatar lease and maintenance services.

Luxury hotel. With spa, buffet, bar, luxury lounge.
Free to enter, you can rest here for as long as you want, they only ask you to pay when you leave.

A supermassive entertainment complex - arcade, casino, roller coaster rides, etc.

item.title: Noah's-Ark
item.description: The boat built by Nomads to survive the apocalypse brought by the Final War and get to the last home, Antarctica

item.title: Nomads
item.description:
People who choose to live outside of the grid and procreate freely.


The apocalypse ship the nomads built to get to antarctica.

item.title: Proto-Mars
item.description:
The first intelligent civilization appeared on Mars about 4 Billion years ago. (Referred as Proto-Martian Civilization contemporarily)
The Proto-Martians are almost genetically identical to contemporary[1] humans. It was a mystery to Scientists why Proto-Martians had the magical ability called Heliomancy]. (Later it was found that humans never lost the magical ability but the Geomagnetic Field of earth was a firewall that nullify any magical forces)



Earth Civilization↩︎
